name: The Fool
storyline: A great danger threatens the kingdom – the dragon has devastated our lands. Help a gentle Fool defeat the Dragon and become a Hero. Win the heart of the princess in this fantastic adventure tale of good and evil.
summary: Who said that only brave knights on white stallions can become Heroes? Witness the incredible adventures of a rustic Fool; travel with him to a fascinating world and help him save the beautiful princess Catherine from the jaws of a terrible dragon. A Hero lives in every one of us! Journey to set your Hero free!
